attributes.action: Stop Energy bills from rising in April
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to not put up Energy prices as this will make pensioners and people on a low income struggle, the elderly will struggle to keep houses warm and could possibly pass away through this, families will struggle whether to put food on the table or pay their Gas and electric bills
attributes.background: Stop Energy bills from rising in April 2022

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586
